text: Arne Reidar Mikkelsen (born July 23, 1944) is a Norwegian ice hockey player. He played for the Norwegian national ice hockey team, and participated at the Winter Olympics in 1968 and in 1972. He was awarded Gullpucken as best Norwegian ice hockey player in 1973. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Ice hockey players at the 1968 Winter Olympics Category:Ice hockey players at the 1972 Winter Olympics Category:Norwegian ice hockey players Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Norway Category:Sportspeople from Oslo
title: Arne Mikkelsen
